Show / Hide Table of Contents

Namespace ASE_Assignment

Classes

AppCanvas

Represents a canvas for drawing various shapes and handling pen operations.

AppCommandFactory

A specialized factory class for creating custom commands such as tri, write, for, and while. Inherits from BOOSE.CommandFactory and enhances it with additional command types.

CanvasException

Custom exception class for canvas-related errors.

CommandArray

Represents a custom implementation of an array command, inheriting functionality from the BOOSE.Array class. Includes additional error handling and parameter validation.

CommandFor

Custom implementation of the "for" command, extending the functionality of the BOOSE.For class from BOOSE. Provides options for additional restrictions and custom behavior.

CommandInt

Customized implementation of the "int" command, removing any restrictions on its usage.

CommandMethod

Custom implementation of the "method" command, removing all restrictions for its usage.

CommandParser

A class responsible for parsing and processing commands, integrating with a drawing canvas and error display.

CommandPeek

Custom implementation of the "peek" command, extending the BOOSE.Peek class. Modifies behavior for compiling, executing, and parameter validation, with enhanced error handling.

CommandPoke

Custom implementation of the "poke" command, extending the BOOSE.Poke class. Modifies behavior for compiling, executing, and validating parameters, with custom error handling.

CommandReal

Custom implementation of the "real" command to remove any restrictions.

CommandTriangle

Represents a command to draw a triangle on the canvas with specified dimensions.

CommandWhile

Custom implementation of the "while" command. Extends the BOOSE BOOSE.While class, removing restrictions and enabling customization.

CustomStoredProgram

Custom implementation of a stored program that allows enhanced functionality, such as clearing variables and resetting the program state.

Form1

Represents the main form for the application, which provides the user interface and integrates with the canvas for drawing operations.
